verses.verse: And he <S%G1166>showed<s%> me a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2986>clear<s%> as <S%G2930>crystal,<s%> <S%G1607>proceeding<s%> out of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

In the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G4113>street<s%> of it, and <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1782>either<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1782>side<s%> of the <S%G4215>river,<s%> was there the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> which <S%G4160>bore<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> manner of <S%G2590>fruits,<s%> and <S%G591>yielded<s%> her <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G3376>month:<s%> and the <S%G5444>leaves<s%> of the <S%G3586>tree<s%> were for the <S%G2322>healing<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations.<s%>

And there shall be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G2652>curse:<s%> but the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> shall be in it; and his <S%G1401>servants<s%> shall <S%G3000>serve<s%> him:
And they shall <S%G3708>see<s%> his <S%G4383>face;<s%> and his <S%G3686>name<s%> shall be in their <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>

And there shall be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1563>there;<s%> and they <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G5532><s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3088>candle,<s%> neither <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun;<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> gives them <S%G5461>light:<s%> and they shall <S%G936>reign<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to me, <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> are <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G228>true:<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> his <S%G32>angel<s%> to <S%G1166>show<s%> to his <S%G1401>servants<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1722>shortly<s%> <S%G5034><s%> be <S%G1096>done.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly:<s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that <S%G5083>keeps<s%> the <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> book. <S%G975><s%>

And I <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G991>saw<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, and <S%G191>heard<s%> them. And <S%G3753>when<s%> I had <S%G191>heard<s%> and <S%G991>seen,<s%> I <S%G4098>fell<s%> down to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1166>showed<s%> me <S%G5023>these<s%> things.

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to me, <S%G3708>See<s%> you do it not: for I <S%G1510>am<s%> your fellow <S%G4889>servant,<s%> and of your <S%G80>brothers<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and of them which <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book:<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G4972>Seal<s%> not the <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book:<s%> for the <S%G2540>time<s%> is <S%G1451>at<s%> <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

He that is <S%G91>unjust,<s%> let him be <S%G91>unjust<s%> <S%G2089>still:<s%> and he which is <S%G4510>filthy,<s%> let him be <S%G4510>filthy<s%> <S%G2089>still:<s%> and he that is <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> let him be <S%G1344>righteous<s%> <S%G2089>still:<s%> and he that is <S%G40>holy,<s%> let him be <S%G37>holy<s%> <S%G2089>still.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly;<s%> and my reward <S%G3408><s%> is with me, to <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G5613>according<s%> as his <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be.
I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1>Alpha<s%> and <S%G5598>Omega,<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> and the <S%G5056>end,<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> and the last. <S%G2078><s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are they that <S%G4160>do<s%> his <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> that they may <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> to the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> and may <S%G1525>enter<s%> in through the <S%G4440>gates<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city.<s%>

For <S%G1854>without<s%> are <S%G2965>dogs,<s%> and <S%G5333>sorcerers,<s%> and <S%G4205>fornicators,<s%> and <S%G5406>murderers,<s%> and <S%G1496>idolaters,<s%> and <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5368>loves<s%> and <S%G4160>makes<s%> a <S%G5579>lie.<s%>

I <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> have <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> to <S%G3140>testify<s%> to you <S%G5023>these<s%> things in the <S%G1577>churches.<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> and the <S%G1085>offspring<s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> and the <S%G2986>bright<s%> and <S%G3720>morning<s%> star. <S%G792><s%>

And the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> and the <S%G3565>bride<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2064>Come.<s%> And let him that <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2064>Come.<s%> And let him that is <S%G1372>thirsty<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%> And <S%G3588>whoever<s%> <S%G2309>will,<s%> let him <S%G2902>take<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1432>freely.<s%>

For I <S%G4828>testify<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man shall <S%G2007>add<s%> to <S%G5023>these<s%> things, <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2007>add<s%> to him the <S%G4127>plagues<s%> that are <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G975>book:<s%>

And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man shall <S%G851>take<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> from the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G851>take<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> his <S%G3313>part<s%> out of the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> and out of the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> and from the things which are <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G975>book.<s%>

He which <S%G3140>testifies<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3483>Surely<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> quickly. <S%G5035><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> <S%G3483>Even<s%> <S%G3483>so,<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
